Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png"
wait(3) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

bombScript = script.Parent.Bomb Tool = script.Parent
function plant(pos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
local bomb = Tool.Handle:Clone() bomb.CanCollide = true bomb.Transparency = 0 bomb.Position = pos bomb.Name = "Shell" bomb.Locked = true
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = bomb
bomb.Parent = game.Workspace local new_script = bombScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = bomb
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 plant(Tool.Handle.Position) wait(23) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

FuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") FuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11565378" FuseSound.Parent = script.Parent FuseSound:Play()
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") local shell = script.Parent local initPos = shell.Position local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local sparkles = {}
force.Parent = shell
local colors = {Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(0,1,0)}
function onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, creator) if part.Name == "Head" then local humanoid = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) -- tag does not need to expire iff all explosions lethal
if creator ~= nil then local new_tag = creator:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
for i=1,10 do force.force = shell.CFrame.lookVector * shell:GetMass() * 98 * 3 wait(.1) end
force:Remove()
--- BOOM!
local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Rocket shot.wav" sound.Parent = script.Parent sound.Volume = 1 sound:play()
local numOfSparkles = 30 sparkles = {}
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPos.P = 500 bodyPos.D = 550 bodyPos.maxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * bodyPos.P
-- this is incredibly messy........ happy 4th of July! :) for j=1,numOfSparkles do
local p = Instance.new("Part") p.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) p.Transparency = 1 p.CanCollide = false p.Position = shell.Position p.Velocity = shell.Velocity debris:AddItem(p, 23)
local s = Instance.new("Sparkles") s.Color = colors[math.random(1,#colors)] s.Parent = p
table.insert(sparkles,p)
local f = Instance.new("BodyForce") f.force = Vector3.new(0,600,0) f.Parent = p debris:AddItem(f, 3)
local increment = (math.pi *2)/numOfSparkles local angle = increment * j
local pos = Vector3.new(((p.Position.x - initPos.x) * math.cos(angle)) - ((p.Position.y - initPos.y) * math.sin(angle)) +initPos.x, ((p.Position.x - initPos.x) * math.sin(angle)) + ((p.Position.y - initPos.y) * math.cos(angle)) + initPos.y,p.Position.z)
local bodyPosForce = bodyPos:clone() bodyPosForce.position = Vector3.new(pos.x,pos.y + 80, pos.z)
local bodyAngle = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bodyAngle.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(50,50,50) bodyAngle.P = 500 bodyAngle.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * bodyAngle.P
p.Parent = game.Workspace
bodyPosForce.Parent = p bodyAngle.Parent = p
end
shell.Transparency = 1 wait(2) shell:Remove()
wait(3)
for i = 1, #sparkles do sparkles[i].BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(initPos.x,initPos.y + 10, initPos.z) end
wait(4)
for i =1, #sparkles do sparkles[i].BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(sparkles[i].Position.x + math.random(-50,50), initPos.y + math.random(50,100), sparkles[i].Position.z + math.random(-50,50)) end
wait(2.5)
for i =1, #sparkles do
for j = 1,3 do local newSpark = sparkles[i]:clone() newSpark.BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(sparkles[i].Position.x + math.random(-50,50), initPos.y + math.random(-10,50), sparkles[i].Position.z + math.random(-50,50)) newSpark.Sparkles.Color = colors[math.random(1,#colors)] newSpark.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(newSpark,5) end
end
wait(5)
local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure = 5 e.BlastRadius = 10
for i = 1, #sparkles do
sparkles[i].BodyPosition:remove() local upForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") upForce.force = Vector3.new(0,240,0) upForce.Parent = sparkles[i] end
wait(1)
for i = 1, #sparkles do
local exp = e:clone() exp.Position = sparkles[i].Position exp.Parent = game.Workspace sparkles[i]:remove() wait(0.3)
end
